data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Thoothukkudi, Tamil Nadu, India. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Thoothukkudi, Tamil Nadu, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Thoothukkudi, Tamil Nadu, India to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Thoothukkudi to agree with you and with one another.
Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who are far from you in Thoothukkudi. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Kanikkaran people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Kanikkaran people know you.
Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Thoothukkudi.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Thoothukkudi, Tamil Nadu, India to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 19,252 believers in Thoothukkudi, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

location.name: Thoothukkudi
location.people_groups_list: Krishnanvak, Vettakkaran, Nanjil Mudali, Vellalan Nanjanad, Alavan
